title: *cough* *cough* got low priority queue for internet issues :/
body: I was playing a bot game when  my internet dropped and came back up and it would dc me and won't let me reconnect it said "Please check your internet" or something like that :( 10 min low priority queue :( I wish riot made a better leaver buster system so they know it wasn't acctually their fault I {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: You disconnected, ruining a game for 4 other people. Whether it is your fault or not is irrelevant.

1. You don't get low priority for leaving one game
2. Don't play when you have unstable net

*cough* *cough* i dc 1 game and it said "don't afk anymore and you type i agree" i did that then i dc for 1 game after that then a penalty :/ my friends dc 1 million times and don't get caught out :/ they r lvl 30

it takes more than one dc to get leaver busted. It also depends on the length of the dc, if your friends "dc a million times" but don't dc for longer than 5mins I don't think the system picks up on that (correct if wrong)

if it's not riots fault, it's your fault.
your internet is your responsibility, and if it fails, its your responsibility.
Same happened to me i cried

If you are in a game with other players, you will face leaverbuster penalties regardless of whether it is intentional or not. Even if it is unintentional, you ahve still ruined the other peoples game, be that 4 people or 9 people. 

You will not face leaverbuster penalties if it only happens occasionally. You will only face punishments if you afk/dc frequently or consistently. Even if it is not intentional, if you know your internet is unstable and choose to play anyway you have to accept that you will face punishment for dcs.
